metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9031 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The WebUI component in Deluge before 1.3.15 contains a directory traversalvulnerability involving a request in which the name of the render file isnot associated with any template file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9031` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

deluge - 1.3.15-2
deluge-common - 1.3.15-2
deluge-console - 1.3.15-2
deluge-gtk - 1.3.15-2
deluge-torrent - 1.3.15-2
deluge-web - 1.3.15-2
deluge-webui - 1.3.15-2
deluged - 1.3.15-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: deluge package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.15-2').
